archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.3.3b: b) detection (e.g. defining threat scenarios to monitor, developing alerts for anomalous behaviour and establishing a mechanism for the receipt of suspicious activity reports from IT practitioners, business users or external parties)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
